pages.text: As you were exploring for geodes from which to refill your ever-dwindling supply of basalt and calcite, you stumbled across a... thing, made from one of those stones. Just being in its presence is enough to charge the air with remnants of some sort of energy. Whatever this monolith is, it seems dormant now, and may prove valuable for salvage - though you can't quite shake off a feeling of unease....

Whatever this obelisk is, it is clearly dangerous. When you touched your Paintbrush to what you correctly assumed was its core, the thing merely sent a shock of *something* your way - you're lucky to be able to write legibly. Perhaps, though, this was its way of signaling something? Maybe it would react differently to, say, your magical pigments?

Indeed, firing a blast of Ink at the core yielded a violent release of energy, accompanied by quite the visual spectacle. Curiously, your reserves of the color of Ink you used appear replenished... but the core seems to have broken beyond repair, now. You suppose you'll have to find another to witness this again.
